project.description: run Bluestore test in linode to measure KB/obj required by RocksDB. This test will run 3 passes, measuring RocksDB space used with "ceph daemon osd.N perf dump | grep db_used". It will compute statistics from this. If the percent deviation exceedsd 10% the test will fail.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: max_objs
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: maximum objects created by this script (may create less if test runs longer than max_time seconds)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: max_secs
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: maximum duration of test in seconds (test will be shorter if max_objs objects created before then)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: pass_delay
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: seconds to sleep between test passes, to give Ceph time to clean up pool, etc.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: #!/bin/bash -x script_dir=/automated_ceph_test export ANSIBLE_INVENTORY=$script_dir/ceph-linode/ansible_inventory testscript=rados_delete_create.sh ansible -m copy -a "src=$ANSIBLE_INVENTORY dest=/root" client-000 ansible -m copy -a "src=/var/lib/jenkins/.ssh/id_rsa dest=/root/.ssh/id_rsa_jenkins" ansible -m copy -a "src=/var/lib/jenkins/.ssh/id_rsa.pub dest=/root/.ssh/id_rsa_jenkins.pub" ansible -m copy -a "src=$script_dir/scripts/$testscript dest=/root" client-000 ansible -m shell -a "bash -x /root/$testscript $obj_size $max_objs $max_secs $pass_delay 2>&1 | tee /root/$testscript.log" client-000 ansible -m fetch -a "path=/root/$testscript.log dest=$archive_dir"
